name: Mega Jump Infinite
description:
Get ready for infinite fun: the newest installment of the #1 jumping series is here!
Join Redford and his forest friends as you jump your way to the top, grabbing tons of treasure, power-ups, and prizes along the way! Simple swipe or tilt controls make swerving around enemies and catching moving coins a breeze, so there’s no better time to jump in!

AMAZING FEATURES:
· Jump, boost, bounce, and smash your way through dozens of colorful environments!
· Play as over 15 characters — from Pepper the Penguin to Dizzy the Dragon — and use their special abilities to reach even greater heights!
· Blastoff with awesome power-ups, from the classic fireball to the all-new freeze ray and slow-motion abilities.
· Collect loads of treasure and launch into the stratosphere with mega mode!
· Conquer hundreds of challenging missions for lucky prizes and secret characters!
